Content: I tried atomic swap with new update. First, sound is a little annoying me. Second, fee is comming out once(if succeed the swap only right?). It was fantastic to me. Thank you devs!

Author: saturday#4156
Content: recent version, the fee is comming out  once and coin is out once.

Author: artemciy_dice#0049
Content: Playing silent sounds on iOS is unlikely an option, it is an old and infamous trick, iOS reviewers are well-aware of it and it gets applications banned most of the time.

Author: artemciy_dice#0049
Content:
But reading this discussion I see that the annoying sound is mostly the one we have when there are active orders but no ongoing swaps. I think we can tune the volume of that one even lower. And we can turn it off altogether on Android, where we don't have to play the sound all the time to stay alive.
Just my two cents.

Author: Don King#8901
Content:
HEX is now the 2nd largest erc20 by tx after tether, their Telegram community is growing rapidly, Richard Heart is a master at promotion and marketing, it would be great to see HEX  traded on AtomicDEX,  the exposure for Komodo would be awesome!

AtomicDEX could be the wings above HEX's wind, RH blows a lot of hot air!

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: Ohm i just noticed that AtomicDEX has used 18Gbytes of data in one month period in Android phone. @ca333

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: Is that normal? Doesn't sound like.

Author: ca333#0118
Content: @Mark81 thanks for info - we are aware and for now its "normal" but we will improve this as part of networking and matching-engine refactoring.
